reviewText: I did find this Hot Body DVD to be of top quality. Excellent choice and I hope to secure many more like this one.

This show featured 21 or so beautiful women competing for prizes in a wet t-shirt contest. The winner has an incredible body and filled out her wet t-shirt perfectly. Other contestants were April, Serenity, Sana Fay, to name a few more memorable ladies.

Great production value and camera angles. I would highly recommend this title and others in their series. Excellent still photography/gallery and other clips of Hot Body shows.
It was the greatest video I'd ever seen, but I usually rent nature documentries and whack off to the female gorillas, anyway GREAT MOVIE!
